Body:
data = np.random.multivariate_normal([0, 0], [[3, 0], [0, 9]], size=2000000)
parameters = ['x', 'y']
c = ChainConsumer()
c.add_chain(data, parameters=parameters)
p, cor = c.analysis.get_covariance()
assert p[0] == 'x'
assert p[1] == 'y'
assert np.isclose(cor[0, 0], 3, atol=0.02)
assert np.isclose(cor[1, 1], 9, atol=0.02)
assert np.isclose(cor[0, 1], 0, atol=0.02)
assert cor.shape == (2, 2)
